name: 洪子逸
objective:
本課程之目的在於教導管理學院學生能夠以線性代數中所提供之各種方法來求解線性連立方程組，並奠定研習線型規畫，作業研究等課程之基礎。課程內容分別為：矩陣、方程式之解、行列式、向量等。
The objective of this course is to introduce the linear algebra to the management students by using several different methods to solve the linear dependent equations so as to build up the fundamental knowledge of Linear Programming and Operations Research. The contents include: matrices, linear equations, determinants, vectors, vector spaces, etc.
